info.name: Ayoub
info.description:
# AYOUB CONSE PITCH DECK

[Technical Pitch Deck](https://miro.com/app/board/uXjVOb2Cb9k=/?moveToWidget=3458764531220249895&cot=14)

# ***AYOUB CONSE GAME FLOW***

*   Every God must create a group first then define an event related to that group so the players can purchase the event to participate in.
*   Every God must define the a deck roles from all none disabled roles (which are created by the Dev) first to create an event for players.
*   Every Dev must define roles before creating a deck
*   A deck contains all defined roles by the God.
*   Every God can update the role, side, status, player ability and phases for a specific event.
*   Every God can chain two players together.
*   Every God can see a player info during the game.
*   Every Player can participate in an event defined by a God
*   Every Player must reserve his/her role by purchasing and event.
*   Every Dev must define sides for the game.
*   Behalf of the user the server will assign the `role_id` and `side_id` for the user.
*   To get all active users of a current event we must iterate through the `phases` field fetched from calling the `Get Single Event` API.
*   Every God must send the updated player info by calling the `Update Event Phase` API after updating the `side_id`, `role_id`, `status`, `player_role_ability` and `player_chain_to` of the user during the game phases.
    

# ***NOTES***

*   All passed in times are in form of UNIX timestamp.
*   All access level must be constant values as defined.
*   All player status must be constant values as defined.
    

# *CONSTANTS*

### **ACCESS LEVELS**

*   Admin Access is 1
*   Dev Access is 0
*   Default User Access is 2
    

### **PLAYER STATUS**

*   Default Status is 0
*   Kick Status is 1
*   Dead Status is 2
*   Three Phases Disability Status is 3
*   Full Disability Status is 4
*   Two Phases Later Silent Status is 5
*   Six Phases Later Silent Status is 6
*   Chained Status is 7
*   Changed Role Status is 8
*   Changed Side Status is 9
*   Exit Status is 10
*   Devote Status is 11
*   Nine Phases Later Pro Killer Status is 12
